snippet.title: Deck RX Official Kickstarter trailer
snippet.description:
Deck RX is a rogue-lite deck-builder game where you face your opponents in a completely different way... RACING!

Deck RX mixes traditional deck-building elements  such as: card collection, permanent death, turn based tactics, battle against bosses... along with hand-crafted levels in a race to the death!

You can play the FREE DEMO at: 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1529180/Deck_RX_The_Deckbuilding_Racing_Game/

Support us on Kickstarter:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/deckrx/deckrx-the-deckbuilding-racing-videogame

RT + Share appreciated: 

https://twitter.com/meteorbyte_stu/status/1455943204734443523

Presskit: 

https://mega.nz/folder/CmRxCQrQ#hnnswZVVMxeHffW0gDoeqw

Join our DISCORD to get the latest news on our games: https://discord.com/invite/mbs
